#summary Downloadable packages of ADDA
#labels Featured

All ADDA packages released since version 0.73 are available at [https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0B-b8kzeJFSENaFRWMXhINHJvMDA#list external repository]. Below we provide direct download links for the latest versions. 

= Latest stable version (1.2) =
This version is recommended for general use. See PackageDescription and ReleaseNotes for more information.
 	
 * [https://drive.google.com/uc?export=download&id=0B-b8kzeJFSENSm9oclhMbjhGRkE Main package] (sources, sample input and output files, and miscellaneous packages)
 * [https://drive.google.com/uc?export=download&id=0B-b8kzeJFSENc1FFVzQ4R3gxWm8 Win32 executables] (also requires the main package)
 * [https://drive.google.com/uc?export=download&id=0B-b8kzeJFSENZlRQQXJrRFduWFU Win64 executables] (also requires the main package)

= Latest beta version (1.3b4) =
This version is for testing the newest features. Use it with caution! See [http://a-dda.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/doc/history doc/history] and [http://a-dda.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/doc/manual.pdf manual] for more information.

 * [https://drive.google.com/uc?export=download&id=0B-b8kzeJFSENbFJsS3E0dTFMa2c Main package] (sources, sample input and output files, and miscellaneous packages)
 * [https://drive.google.com/uc?export=download&id=0B-b8kzeJFSENWGZfV2Fxd1BILUE Win32 executables] (also requires the main package)
 * [https://drive.google.com/uc?export=download&id=0B-b8kzeJFSENUTNtdE82NEJyVTg Win64 executables] (also requires the main package)
